item.title: “Conference Preparation Tips” Part of Spring Graduate Lunch and Learn Series
item.description: Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Professors Julius Agung, Bill Francis, Jacob Shelley, and Oshani Seneviratne will discuss strategic conference preparation, beginning with advanced planning, setting goals, and identifying people you want to meet. Lunch will be served from 12 to 12:30; seating for this hybrid event is limited.

item.title: Michelle Broadhurst Named RPI Athletics Academic Advisor
item.description: Rensselaer Athletics is pleased to announce that Michelle Broadhurst has been hired as the department’s Athletics Academic Advisor.

item.title: TIAA Offering Confidential In-Person Retirement Counseling January 15
item.description:
Date: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 8:30 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement benefits!

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
